name: Fairy Tool with Salvatore Aggiustatutto
description:
Fairy Tool is an unusual Fairy Tale whose hero is Salvatore, il folletto aggiustatutto (the tinkerer fairy). He aims to protect Granny, a sweet old lady, from the dangers of her own house! But watch out, Salvatore also needs to avoid to be detected, because the fragile Granny’s heart can’t tolerate to discover that fairies are real (and have moustache!). 

So, Salvatore has to repair all the issues of this old dilapidated house as stealthy and quickly as possible!

Use A and D key to move left and right, then use SPACE for repair, hide or change floor.

And please, don’t kill Granny.
